General.Name: Octopus Renewables Infra Trust
General.Description: Octopus Renewables Infrastructure Trust plc operates as a closed end investment company in Europe and Australia. The company also focuses on building and operating a diversified portfolio of renewable energy assets. As of December 31, 2022, it owned a portfolio of 36 renewable energy assets covering the operational capacity of 662 MW. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Senator House, London, United Kingdom, EC4V 4AB
